programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: Wheres Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Shrink O Matic
programme.desc: The Creepy Candy TM sneak into Victors secret laboratory looking for adventure and discover his newest experiment The Shrinkomatic! Just as Victor gets back and discovers the Creepy Candy TM they accidentally activate the shrink ray with hilarious consequences. Will they be able return to their normal size before Miss Paige finds out? Tune into this exciting episode to see how the mystery ends!

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: KALAI-TEA-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is organizing a Kathakali performance in front of his teashop for a group of special guests in the evening. The Kathakali dancer is in the shop enjoying tea and snacks. In the crazy fight between Sundar and Basha, the dancers both legs gets bandaged and he runs away from the shop. Chai Raja catches Sundar in the act! Chai Raja is so angry and panicking. He decides that Sundar is going to dance Kathakali! Next we see a poor Sundar all dressed up in the Kathakali costume with his snout sticking out. The performance starts and Sundar doesnt know what to do. The naughty Basha still has no plans to leave poor Sundaralone. He tries to trips, tickle, push and irritate Sundar from the rafter of the stage. Sundar is running all over the stage musch to Bashas delight and Chai Rajas horror. But the special guests love Sundars performance and awards him with a trophy! Basha is stunnedand Sundar is thrilled beyond words!

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: FAN-FARE
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the one and only small table fan is the point of all attraction. Chai Raja deftly improvises for himself, but he is extremely concerned that none of his customers should have cause to complain. Sundar, himself too pouring from his pores, ignores his discomfort and sets about switching the blast of breeze (though its a rickety and extremely temperamental old fan) to keep the customers cool. But Basha wants his bit of breeze and is intent to steal the wind from Sundars sails! A tug-of-war for the fan ensues... Basha plays havoc sticking vadas under the fan for wheels and wheeling it off or by hoisting it up with a tricky fishing line. Sundar tries to keep the customers happy by using palm-leaf fans and fanning with all limbs possible...but the customers are too many. And Basha aggravates matters by using the fans breeze to spray paint Sundars body with fruit juice! Sundar chases Basha who smartly propels himself about with the fan, and even blows pillow fluff at Sundar to deter him from the chase. But the last proves to be a bad idea as the fluff sticks in the fan blades, damages it and the rusty things blows up! Scene cuts to show Sundar running behind Basha..but when camera pulls back we see that the two are on a kind of crude treadmill that powers a giant coconut frond wind-mill that lulls breeze at the tea-shop. Chai Raja grins and sloshes tea that forms a smiley with a wink at camera.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: COMMANDO KAPPA
programme.desc: Chai Raja cycles in with a fresh batch of bananas when heavy army boots crunch in stomping at the door of the hotel. Chai Raja looks up and is not one jot happy to see his bossy estranged uncle Commando Kappa. Commando Kappa is a bossy man who wants to take over the hotel from Chai Raja and is zany enough to try any underhanded trick . Sundar senses this animosity and wants Kappa out of the shop but 6 and a half foot , Arnold like built Commando Kappa is a tough man to cross. Because he is no great cook, Kappa uses his army tactics to sabotage and tries messing up Chai Rajas ingredients- he switches the ingredients for the tea, Chai Raja knives suddenly go missing etc- Chai Raja however is quick at adapting and when knives go missing he merely uses his moustache to chop the bananas! Sunder too does his best to foil Kappa. and save Chai Raja- like when Kappa accidentally spills oil intending to slip up Chai Raja, Sundar rather himself skid in and break his own bones just so Chai Raja doesnt step into the oil or guzzle up all the chilli-spiced tea (thanks to Kappa dropping chilli powder into the brew on the sly) before Chai Raja serves it to customers and loses his reputation. However the curious Basha keeps poking his naughty nose in and its difficult for Sundar to keep up with Kappas ploys. Kappa tries to finally seize up the flexible Chai Raja, by offering a tampered herbal oil to limber him up (the oil actually stiffens whatever it is poured on- can demonstrate the effect when Kappa does a test on a small sapling on the sill). But just then Sundar and Basha tumble in as part of their chase and the oil flies landing on Kappa gets all seized up and stiff. The cricked Kappa gives up and is shown the door and Basha gives him a 21- banana peel sendoff. But Sundar has no time to rejoice for Basha is again sneaking up to the fries and must be stopped.

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: TEA-THING TRAUMA
programme.desc: Chai Rajas old aunt, a lady who is pencil thin and frail as a willow turns up for a visit. Sundar believes she is a sweet toothless granny, the wallpaper kind- but what he or Basha for that matter dont anticipate is the granny to have a voracious appetite. The granny gobbles up just about anything in sight and the trays barely make it out of the kitchen to the customers. Sundar almost catches her red-handed and when questioned by Chai Raja for the missing snacks blames her- in return he gets a sound thwack on his head as a furious Chai Raja points at his granny who beams wide- she is toothless! How can she eat without teeth! Demands Chai Raja. Sundar too is perplexed and so is Basha who too is annoyed to find his normal share of fritters missing. Basha and he team up to corner the artful granny. They soon discover that she has a hidden pair of dentures that she uses conveniently to chew down the chow. With Bashas help, Sundar manages to snatch away the dentures and the shop erupts in chaos as the granny proves that she too has quite a killer aim with plates! She retrieves the dentures and is about to chomp down in triumph when Chai Raja happens on her. But all the sweet-natured Chai Raja does is pack some extra fritters for her as she bids him a goodbye while an exasperated Sundar chases Basha from again raiding the shelves.

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: MOUSE TRAP
programme.desc: Business is a bit slow at the tea shop and Chai Raja tries churning up new inventive snacks to entice in the customers. The overworked Sundar can only salivate at the sight of the overflowing platters of food and zealously guards them from Basha. It takes all of Sundars self-control not to sample even a fallen fritter/vada. Chai Raja meanwhile opens his larder to take some more flour when much to his shock, he sees a small tail flick out of sight. Mice!! Chai Raja immediately sets Sundar the task of getting rid of them. Sundar after some paw-snapped agony manages to rig a mousetrap and sets it to catch the scurrying culprit. He waits all night and finally dozes off when he is awakened by the snap of the trap. Sundar victoriously marches only to find in the trap, a baby mouse in a diaper. The little tyke of a rodent wails so piteously that Sundar, after some stern admonishing, ushers out of the shop and signals that he should not return. Next morning , business is brisk and Sundar rushes about to wait on customers when he hears a shriek. The lady customer points and much to his shock Sundar sees the diaper-mouse scurry with fritters. Sundar gets an earful from Chai Raja for not completing his task. The wily Basha meanwhile ferrets out the baby mouse and surprises it as it steals the next time- but Basha too is charmed by the baby mouse and ends up showing it his secret stash of fritters. The baby mouse acts as in complete awe of Basha and wants to be his crony.Basha is thrilled and starts tutoring the baby mouse in the art of stealing fritters. The baby mouse goes one step further and uses his big baby eyes each time Sundar catches him- one long wide-eyed pleading look and Sundars heart melts. Both Sundar and Basha think that they will be the mentor to the baby mouse who however is quite a prankster.

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Shout
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting to use appropriate voice levels when interacting with others. Outside Voices vs. Inside Voice. (Learn by practicing to) Use the proper volume in the appropriate environments

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Little big lizard
programme.desc: The twins help a tiny lizard who everyone was ignoring, find a princesss ring and save the day.

programme.title: The Return of The Stareoffolous
programme.desc: Odessa can’t seem to lose the Stareoffolous in a game of hide-and-seek. Finding the goodness in everyone/everything.

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: Balloonastics
programme.desc: When Pancake becomes bored with a household chore, he gives up in frustration. Later in the Zooniverse, he’s delighted to help the fallen North Star return to the night sky, but first he has to learn to value the smaller task he has been given, and how it can add to the whole. Be open minded and optimistic, and you’ll be able to take pride in any job!

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: 1,2,3… Smile~
programme.desc: Duda discovers Dadas digital camera. Suddenly, he becomes hooked on taking photos. Scot shows up thinking they are going on a picnic. But, he finds out that they are going swimming in the lake instead. Ashamed of not knowing how to swim, Scot tries to practice in a kiddie pool when no one is around. Unfortunately, Duda captures Scots embarrassing moment on camera. Afraid that Duda will show the photo to others, Scot is determined to delete it at all costs. After losing his boat to Duda in a bet, Scot becomes frantic when he sees his friends taking a ride on it with Duda and his camera. Without thinking, Scot jumps into the lake to go after them. Will Scot be okay?

programme.title: A strange Footprint
programme.desc: Bubbles reads a story about scary monsters to Doubt and Caber. Duda finds her funny, but Caber is really scared. The next morning, Bubbles finds a giant footprint in the ground. Doubt and Caber thinks a monster did it, but Bubbles and Dad tell them that monsters dont exist. Hearing all the commotion about monsters, Scot decides to dress up as one and scare everyone for fun. When he tries to scare Duda, things dont go as planned. Instead of being afraid, Duda is excited to meet the "monster." Duda chases the "monster" up a tree, but soon discovers that he is just a Scotsman in disguise. Suddenly, something falls from the tree! Scot runs away, screaming that he is a real monster. Maybe monsters really exist...

programme.title: Die Laughing - The Emperor’s New Clothes
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Emperor’s New Clothes”, having been called out by the father of HANS, a 5-year-old boy. HANS has gone missing during the parade in which the EMPEROR wore his new clothes for the first time in public. SANDRA discovers that HANS is, in fact, the little boy who laughs when he sees the EMPEROR in his underwear, thus revealing the obvious truth that no one dared mention: the Emperor has no clothes on. The detective will also discover that Rufus, the Emperor’s bitter, resentful jester, is behind the disappearance of HANS.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Beggar for a Day
programme.desc: Jamillah and Aladdin meet a beggar in Baghdad. He gives them a emerald ring to take care of. Convinced he is a thief, Genie and Aladdin try to convince Jamillah to hand the ring in. There might be a reward! Jamillah isnt easily convinced and goes to others for help. They ask local wise man Akbar who convinces them to let him take care of it, only to run off with the ring himself. With Genies help they track Akbar the thief down and Jamillah is rewarded when the beggar returns and reveals himself to be the sultan!

programme.title: Books And Roses
programme.desc: Braianna’s Fake Robot Parents go on love overdrive, hoarding every book and rose in town, just as they are in demand for the romantic holiday.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Toy Room – Steadfast Ti Soldier
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the “Steadfast Tin Soldier”, having been called out by the soldier’s toy companions. SANDRA, who has always dreamt of changing this story’s tragic ending, hopes she will be able to prevent the Soldier and the Ballerina from being thrown into the fire. But, once they arrive in the toys’ room, it does not take SANDRA long to realise that her mission is going to be very difficult indeed. The evil JACK-IN-THE-BOX has taken the SOLDIER prisoner and threatens to melt him down into a useless lump of tin if the BALLERINA does not agree to marry him.

programme.title: The Magic Factory – Hansel & Gretel Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of HANSEL and GRETEL, having been called out by GRETEL. When they arrive, the detective discovers that it has been a year since the witch fell into the oven and the story ended happily. HANSEL and GRETEL’s lives are now happy and prosperous, thanks to the treasure they took from the WITCH. But then GRETEL bought a packet of cakes in which there was an invitation to visit the Magic Factory, a wonderful place full of promises and all kinds of sweet things. Despite his sister’s opposition, HANSEL went to the magic factory. But that was three days ago and HANSEL has still not returned. What mysteries are concealed within that magic factory?

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls "bigness" that helps save the day.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: No me rendiré
programme.desc: Ana lo pierde todo tras falsas acusaciones de asesinato de su marido. Embarazada, ella termina en la cárcel.

programme.title: Historias de amor en Sunflower Valley
programme.desc: Kate regresa a su pueblo para un reportaje, acompañada por su colega, para explorar historias de amor locales.

programme.title: El segundo aire
programme.desc: Elena despierta con las manos cubiertas de sangre y su casa en llamas. Ella no puede recordar nada

programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Betty Boop- The Scared Crows 1939

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Buzzy Boop 1938
programme.desc: Betty's young cousin, Buzzy, takes the train to visit Betty. programme.title: The Lucy Show 1966; Season 5; Episode 10; Lucy and John Wayne
programme.desc: Mr Mooney sends Lucy to deliver some papers pertaining to the financing of John Wayne's latest production. Despite his orders to drop off the papers with one of the studio's secretaries, Lucy insists on meeting Mr. Wayne in person at lunch and spills ketchup all over him. She then trails him to his movie set and causes all sorts of havoc.

The Cure - 1917

programme.title: Eternally Yours-1939
programme.desc: Anita Halstead, swept off her feet by magician Arturo, finds the results less than magical.

programme.title: Those Love Pangs -1914
programme.desc: Charlie and a rival vie for the favors of their landlady. In the park they each fall for different girls, though Charlie's has a male friend already. Charlie considers suicide, is talked out of it by a policeman, and later throws his girl's friend into the lake. Frightened, the girls go off to a movie. Charlie shows up there and flirts with them. Later both rivals substitute themselves for the girls and attack the unwitting Charlie. In an audience-wide fight, Charlie is tossed through the screen.

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors- 1960

programme.title: The Immigrant 1917

programme.title: Dough and Dynamite-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and another waiter must become bakers when the regular bakers go out on strike. The strikers put dynamite in a piece of bread which is delivered to the cake counter. It winds up in the oven and explodes.

programme.title: Neighbors -1920
programme.desc: A young couple who live next to each other in tenement apartments do everything they can to be together despite of their feuding families.

programme.title: His New Job -915
programme.desc: Charlie is trying to get a job in a movie. After causing difficulty on the set, he is told to help the carpenter. When one of the actors doesn't show, Charlie is given a chance to act but instead enters a dice game. When he does finally act, he ruins the scene, wrecks the set, and tears the skirt from the star.

programme.desc: When a complex investigation implicates an ex Justice Minister and his family, detective Guzman has not other choice than free from prison his partner, inspector Pedro Ramirez, to crack the case. Now, Ramirez is back with a new mission that will become a personal challenge to him.

programme.title: Stranger
programme.desc: John and Rebecca drive up to a cabin in the woods near Idyllwild for some peace and quiet. A stranger becomes increasingly intrigued by their presence - little do they know, they'll soon be forced into a deadly game he's compelled to play.

programme.title: They Call Her Headhunter
programme.desc: The wife of a nefarious TV Evangelist hires a savage bounty hunter known as the Headhunter to kidnap her husband and inflict terrible pain before killing him off. But things are not all what they seem in the world of ‘saving lives’ as the Headhunter discovers a very dark and wicked secret inside this cult.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss takes a deep dive into the Julius Caesar cigar. Join Bryan as he rates and reviews this unique stick, highlighting its flavor profile, construction, and overall experience.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: The El Rojo cigar factory is the oldest working cigar factory in the United States. Join us as we take an in depth look at what it takes to turn tobacco leaves into a premium hand rolled cigar.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: This week on Behind the Blend, host Sean sits down with Ryan Bathurst of Oliva Cigars. Dive deep into the story of one of the most respected names in the industry as Ryan shares insights into Oliva's rich heritage, the craftsmanship behind their acclaimed blends, and what goes into maintaining their consistent quality and innovation. Get ready for an illuminating conversation that pulls back the curtain on the world of Oliva.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club

programme.title: The Cigar Guys Podcast

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: I am going to give you 7 great cigars that I can find for $7 and under but this is certainly not the final list. programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow

programme.title: Haunted
programme.desc: An aspiring writer pays a visit to his sister to look after her house while she is out of town, but what he finds there is more terrifying than any of the stories he writes...

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Van Helsing is called upon to help save a missing girl and her friends from a hoard of demons...

programme.title: Cemetery Stories
programme.desc: On Halloween a couple, both of which are clairvoyants, drive to a cemetery. They go for fun to pick up vibrations from the tombstones of the deceased. As they pick up vibrations they have visions of how the person died. Each vibration and vision seems to get darker and darker. In the midst of all of this, they are being stalked by a dark shadowy figure. What starts out as some Halloween fun quickly turns to terror...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Equipo Del Diablo
programme.desc: En una ciudad que queda en la frontera de México y los Estados Unidos hay una batalla entre los narcos El 8 y el Z4 que controlan todo el territorio, pero hay un comando especial de mercenarios que trabajan para su propia cuenta se llaman "El Equipo del Diablo" y su líder es el malvado Diablo. Cuando el gobierno quiere parar lo que esta pasando mandan al agente Ortiz para poner orden, pero como siempre cuando se trata de sicarios, ejercito, y narco.. Solamente el pueblo sale dañado.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo 2
programme.desc: Esta es la continuación del MUNDO ES TUYO. Por fin sabremos que sucedió con los personajes de esta impactante historia.

programme.title: Distopia
programme.desc: Impulsados por antiguos planes esotéricos, poderosas elites ocultas emplean armas bioquímicas, guerra psicológica, cuarentenas mundiales, e incluso magia negra para controlar el futuro de la humanidad y alcanzar la inmortalidad

programme.title: Cuernavaca
programme.desc: El mundo de Andy cambia totalmente cuando su madre tiene un accidente. Sin nadie que lo cuide, es llevado a Cuernavaca, a la casa de su desconocida abuela paterna. Mientras su madre se debate entre la vida y la muerte, el niño se enfrentará a la frialdad de su abuela, al mundo seductor y peligroso del hijo del jardinero y a la búsqueda de su padre

programme.title: Eros Una Vez María
programme.desc: María es el gran amor de Tonatiuh, pero él la pierde. Intenta mantener su esencia, buscando incansablemente en cada mujer que conoce, tratando de obtener tantas experiencias sobre ellas como pueda, para poder encontrar algo que le recuerde a su amor perdido. Todas esas mujeres tienen una particularidad: se llaman María.

programme.title: Amateur
programme.desc: Martín, es un editor que trabaja en un canal de televisión cuyo dueño es el señor Battaglia. Martín se está separando y no tiene donde dormir, por lo que este hombre le ofrece quedarse en uno de sus departamentos en el centro de la cuidad. A la vez a este joven le encomiendan ir al archivo del canal a encontrar una película, pero en dicho lugar todo está desordenado y sin catalogar. A partir de esto, se lleva muchos videos a su nuevo hogar para revisarlos, y entre ellos encuentra uno de tinte erótico que protagoniza una mujer, que luego le será presentada como su vecina Isabel, y esposa de Battaglia. Martín no puede sacarse la imagen de su mente.

programme.title: El Testigo Del Diablo
programme.desc: Cuando una seductora reina vampira decide que es hora de sentar cabeza, limita su búsqueda a cinco candidatos desprevenidos y los atrae a su mansión.

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.
